name: Trash Panda Adventures (Robin)
description:
Trash Panda Adventures was created as a Macromedia intern Game-Jam. The theme was "A game for your mother". 

It is a 2D-PixelArt-Jump'N'Run

You play as a mother raccoon in search of food to support herself and her offspring. Depending on the player's decision, she can beautify nature almost unintentionally from her point of view by taking the garbage from the area with her.

Through the two basic choices at the beginning and end of the game, you then get to one of the three possible endings and meet Gaja, Mother Nature herself.
